title: Moxie blend coffee lovers rejoice!
body: If you didn't already know, the Mudhouse, downtown's favorite coffee house, is finally online. That means you can now buy our delicious Moxie blend coffee direct from the source! That's all. Have a great weekend everyone!
author: Dan

comments.author: EdMo
comments.body: I can't wait to bring back some Moxie beans and other Mudhouse roasts to show my Starbucks employees!
